title: VERBATIM: DOJ details allegations of vast Russian conspiracy
text:
VERBATIM: DOJ details allegations of vast Russian conspiracy 2:21pm EST - 01:29 
Deputy U.S. Attorney General Rod Rosenstein announced the indictment of 13 Russian nationals and three Russian organizations that interfered in the U.S. 2016 election campaign in a multi-pronged effort with the aim of supporting then-businessman Donald Trump and disparaging his rival Hillary Clinton.   
Deputy U.S. Attorney General Rod Rosenstein announced the indictment of 13 Russian nationals and three Russian organizations that interfered in the U.S. 2016 election campaign in a multi-pronged effort with the aim of supporting then-businessman Donald Trump and disparaging his rival Hillary Clinton.  //reut.rs/2sw9udQ
